name: WordLeap
description: WordLeap is an arcade action vocabulary game. In WordLeap your goal is to make rare and interesting words to score points. The game includes several game modes, each with its own style of play. Play story mode to unlock new levels and try to reach enlightenment. Casual mode offers a quick game that you can play any time. Puzzle mode is for those looking for a more intellectual challenge. Extensive leaderboards allow you to compete with players from around the world for the highest scores and best words.
